articles.content:
Shawn Mendes has cancelled the rest of his world tour in the UK, North America and Europe to prioritise his health, the singer has announced.

articles.title: Hit the Road review – irrepressible defiance in beautifully composed debut feature - The Guardian
articles.description: Directed by Panah Panahi, the son of jailed Iranian film-maker Jafar Panahi, this tense family drama is drenched in a subtle but urgent political meaning
articles.content: Great child acting is rare: as is great adult acting and great directing of children and adults. But they all come together in this lovely, beautifully composed debut feature drenched in a subtle but… [+3980 chars]
